data.text: I nama i yɛtɛ matɔxɔ tila yi,
Muxune xa i tantun,
Gɛmɛn binya,
Xɔlɔn ɲaxu,
A fisa muxun sɔnna xa fala a xa kɛnɛnni,
I nɔɛ lɛ i xɔyina fala xɔlɛne ra nɛn,
Naxan lugoxi,
Xɛmɛn naxan a mɛma a konna ra,
Latikɔnɔnna nun wusulanna muxun bɔɲɛn nan nasɛwama,
I nama i xɔyin nabeɲin,
N ma diina, findi fekolonna ra,
Xaxilimaan na gbalon to fɛ,
Naxan na donla tongo i yii muxu gbɛtɛ xa,
Duban xui yitexin na xɔtɔn xɔtɔnni,
Ɲaxanla a yɛngɛ xunxurine luxi nɛn
A ramaran naxɔlɔ alo foyena,
Wuren nan wuren nalemunma,
Wudi binla masuxu muxun nan a bogin donma.
Muxuna a yɛtɛ yɛtagin nininna nan toma igeni.
Laxira nun yahannama mi wasama.
Gbetin nun xɛmaan nasɛnsɛnma sulun tɛɛni,27.21 Sulun tɛɛn mɔn falama yirena nde yi fa fala “Furu tɛɛna.”
Hali i xaxilitaren din wunla kui
I ya xuruseene kolon ki faɲi,
amasɔtɔ nafunla mi luma habadan,
I na sɛxɛne lanfun,
nayi, yɛxɛɛne xabene findima i ya dugine ra nɛn,
Siine nɔnɔn yi gbo ayi, a i wasa,
